AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Inocencio Garcia-Guerrero: Defendant involved in a case of reckless endangerment and death enhancements while transporting unlawful aliens into the United States, with a base offense level enhanced due to the death of Alma Delia Simon-Fernandez
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Alma Delia Simon-Fernandez: Undocumented female alien who died due to heat stroke during transportation by Inocencio Garcia-Guerrero
